Type definition tree_assoc_options_t

tree_assoc_options_t

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/container/options.hpp>


typedef typename boost::container::tree_assoc_options< Options...>::type tree_assoc_options_t;

Description

Helper alias metafunction to combine options into a single type to be used by tree-based associative containers
